body_html:
I'm not sure how extensible the object detection harness is to using custom models. At the very least you'd need to modify the output tensor shape as dictated by outputLocations in TFLiteObjectDetectionAPIModel.

If you're mostly interested in classification, have you considered using the ImageClassifer sample as a template?
body_text:
I'm not sure how extensible the object detection harness is to using custom models. At the very least you'd need to modify the output tensor shape as dictated by outputLocations in TFLiteObjectDetectionAPIModel.
If you're mostly interested in classification, have you considered using the ImageClassifer sample as a template?
body:
I'm not sure how extensible the object detection harness is to using custom models. At the very least you'd need to modify the output tensor shape as dictated by [outputLocations](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/b390be62ad0514f4fd3347b9db3446c84e08a38e/tensorflow/contrib/lite/examples/android/app/src/main/java/org/tensorflow/demo/TFLiteObjectDetectionAPIModel.java#L62) in `TFLiteObjectDetectionAPIModel`.

If you're mostly interested in classification, have you considered using the [ImageClassifer](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/b390be62ad0514f4fd3347b9db3446c84e08a38e/tensorflow/contrib/lite/java/demo/app/src/main/java/com/example/android/tflitecamerademo/ImageClassifier.java) sample as a template?
